attributes.action: Investigate and prosecute any MP who votes in favour of and benefits from Brexit
attributes.background: A number of MPs are believed to have investments, either directly or indirectly, that might lead to them making a financial gain from a decision to leave the EU

rejection.details:
The House of Commons  already has a Code of Conduct for MPs. MPs are already required to register and declare financial interests, and to avoid conflicts of interest, so we're not sure exactly what further action you'd like to see.

You can find the Code of Conduct for the House of Commons here:

https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/standards-and-financial-interests/parliamentary-commissioner-for-standards/code-of-conduct-and-rules-of-the-house/
